https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cg7cJC88d9G8bTUM4kpdYJyFdFJ.jpg A young teen's father dies, and he is sent to an orphanage. He's teased because he stutters almost runs away, until a beautiful, androgynous boy, Yasuo (Sora Toma), convinces him to join the choir. Boy's Choir
